mapper.sql: id, name, pic, description, type, parent_id, status, gmt_created, gmt_modified,domain_id
mapper.insert: insert into merchant_category (name, pic, description, type, parent_id, status, gmt_created, gmt_modified,domain_id) values (#{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pic,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{parentId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{gmtCreated,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{gmtModified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},#{domainId,jdbcType=INTEGER})

pic,

mapper.update:
update merchant_category
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
pic = #{pic,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
type = #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER},
parent_id = #{parentId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
gmt_created = #{gmtCreated,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
gmt_modified = #{gmtModified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
domain_id = #{domainId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update merchant_category set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pic = #{pic,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, type = #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER}, parent_id = #{parentId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, gmt_created = #{gmtCreated,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, gmt_modified = #{gmtModified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, domain_id = #{domainId,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select id,name,parent_id from merchant_category where domain_id=#{domainId}
